item.title: Pluto TVの共同創業者であるイリヤ・ポジンのTellyは、常に広告を表示するセカンドスクリーン付きの55インチ4K HDRテレビを2023年に50万台プレゼントするためのウェイティングリストを開設（Jared Newman/Fast Company）
item.description:
Jared Newman / Fast Company:
Pluto TV co-founder Ilya Pozin's Telly opens a waitlist to give away 500,000 55-inch 4K HDR TVs in 2023 with a second screen that constantly shows ads  —  Would you take a free TV if it constantly ran banner ads beneath everything you watched?  —  That's the proposition for Telly …

item.title: アンテナ：2月にNetflix、Disney+、HBO Maxに加入した米国の加入者のうち～25％が広告を選択、米国の加入者のうち～58％が少なくとも1つの広告付きサービスに支払っている（Lucas Shaw/Bloomberg）
item.description:
Lucas Shaw / Bloomberg:
Antenna: ~25% of US subscribers to Netflix, Disney+, and HBO Max in February opted for ads; ~58% of US subscribers pay for at least one ad-supported service  —  Good afternoon from New York.  We're entering week three of the Hollywood writers strike and there's been no progress.

item.title: [スレッド】元SAG理事・交渉委員が語るAIと俳優への影響、AIの懸念に対応するための厳格なルールを求める（Justine Bateman/@justinebateman）
item.description:
Justine Bateman / @justinebateman:
[Thread] A former SAG board and negotiating committee member talks about AI and how it will affect actors, calling for stricter rules to address AI concerns  —  SAG ACTORS: I want to talk about AI and how it will affect you. I'm a former SAG Board Member and former SAG Negotiating Committee member. I'm also WGA and DGA. 1/

item.title: インターネット理論家であり、かつてのテクノ・オプティミストであり、権力がメディアの風景をどのように移動するかを調べることをライフワークとしているというダグラス・ラッシュコフのプロフィール（マルコム・ハリス／ワイアード）。
item.description:
Malcolm Harris / Wired:
A profile of Douglas Rushkoff, an internet theorist and a former techno-optimist who says his life's work is examining how power travels across media landscapes  —  The former techno-optimist has taken a decisive political left turn.  He says it's the only human option.

item.title: Viceが破産申請、FortressやSoros Fundなどの貸し手に資産を〜$225Mで売却することに合意、資産と負債は$500M〜$1B（Rahat Sandhu/Reuters)
item.description:
Rahat Sandhu / Reuters:
Vice files for bankruptcy and agrees to sell its assets to lenders, including Fortress and Soros Fund, for ~$225M; assets and liabilities are $500M to $1B  —  Vice Media Group, popular for websites such as Vice and Motherboard, filed for bankruptcy protection on Monday to engineer its sale …

item.title: フィラデルフィア・インクワイアラーがサイバー攻撃を受け、週末の業務に影響が及び、1996年以来最大の混乱が発生、復旧時期は不明（Jonathan Lai/The Philadelphia Inquirer）
item.description:
Jonathan Lai / The Philadelphia Inquirer:
The Philadelphia Inquirer is hit by a cyberattack, affecting weekend operations and causing the largest disruption since 1996; restoration timelines are unclear  —  The Philadelphia Inquirer and outside cybersecurity experts continued Sunday to scramble to restore systems …

item.title: バイス・メディアが破産申請、日常業務に支障はない（ニューヨークタイムズ）
item.description:
New York Times:
Vice Media files for bankruptcy; the filing will not interrupt daily business operations  —  Vice, which had wooed media giants, has struggled to adjust to the punishing realities of digital publishing.  A group of creditors could buy Vice for $225 million.

item.title: 2023年ピューリッツァー賞一般ノンフィクション本賞を受賞した『His Name Is George Floyd』のワシントン・ポストのロバート・サミュエルズ氏とトルセ・オロルニパ氏のQ&A（Kelly McBride/Poynter)
item.description:
Kelly McBride / Poynter:
Q&A with The Washington Post's Robert Samuels and Toluse Olorunnipa, whose His Name Is George Floyd won the 2023 Pulitzer Prize for general non-fiction book  —  Robert Samuels and Toluse Olorunnipa discuss writing the richly detailed book about George Floyd's life that won the Pulitzer Prize

item.title: CBSとNBCのTVニュースキャスター、コニー・チャンが、1980年代から1990年代にかけて、アジア系家庭の多くの女の子のファーストネームにどのようにインスピレーションを与えたか、また、実際に出会った人もいる（Connie Wang/New York Times)
item.description:
Connie Wang / New York Times:
How TV news anchor Connie Chung on CBS and NBC inspired the first names of many girls among Asian families in the 1980s and 1990s, and how some met in person  —  It was on my first day of college at the University of California, Berkeley, when I started to realize there were more of us out there.

item.title: インドのストリーミングサービスJioCinemaがPremiumサブスクリプションプランを導入、HBOなどのスタジオのコンテンツや最大4回のログインなどを年間₹999で提供 (Livemint)
item.description:
Livemint:
Indian streaming service JioCinema introduces a Premium subscription plan, offering content from studios like HBO, up to four logins, and more for ₹999 per year  —  JioCinema has introduced a new Premium subscription plan, providing its users with access to a broader range of content.

item.title: 情報源：米国以外の投資家がフォーブスの買収費用を実質的に負担する可能性あり、オースティン・ラッセルは$100M-$200Mをコミットし、サン・グループには$200M-$300Mを投資させるよう交渉中（Sara Fischer/Axios）。
item.description:
Sara Fischer / Axios:
Sources: non-US investors may substantially pay for Forbes' takeover; Austin Russell committed $100M-$200M and is in talks to have Sun Group invest $200M-$300M  —  Forbes agreed to sell itself in a deal that makes it look like the iconic magazine brand is staying in American hands.

item.title: EV企業LuminarのAustin Russell CEOがForbesの82%の株式を取得、評価額は〜$800Mと情報筋が発表：サン・グループ、GSV、その他が買収を支援（Sara Fischer/Axios)
item.description:
Sara Fischer / Axios:
EV company Luminar's CEO Austin Russell acquires an 82% stake in Forbes, a source says at an ~$800M valuation; sources: Sun Group, GSV, and others back the bid  —  Austin Russell, the CEO of electric vehicle technology company Luminar Technologies, has acquired an 82% stake in Forbes.

item.title: 経営トップの退任、脚本家のストライキ、コードカットなど、メディア各社が広告主を呼び込むためのアップフロント・プレゼンテーションが混乱した1年となった（Alex Weprin/The Hollywood Reporter）。
item.description:
Alex Weprin / The Hollywood Reporter:
A chaotic year has upended media companies' upfront presentations to woo advertisers, amid top executive departures, the writers' strike, cord cutting, and more  —  From May 15-18, expect Disney, NBCUniversal and Warner Bros. Discovery execs to work overtime selling their wares to ad buyers during a downturn and a major work stoppage.

item.title: 政府の汚職を調査することで知られ、創設者がマネーロンダリング容疑で裁判中のグアテマラのelPeriódicoは、5月15日に閉鎖を予定している（Sonia Pérez D./Associated Press）。
item.description:
Sonia Pérez D. / Associated Press:
Guatemala's elPeriódico, known for investigating government corruption and whose founder is on trial for money laundering charges, plans to shut down on May 15  —  A Guatemalan newspaper known for hard-hitting investigations of government corruption and whose founder is currently on trial …

item.title: 報告書です：CNNのCEOクリス・リヒトと3人の幹部は、ダーシーのドナルド・トランプのタウンホール批判報道が「感情的すぎる」とオリバー・ダーシーとその編集者に伝えた（Alex Griffing/Mediaite)
item.description:
Alex Griffing / Mediaite:
Report: CNN CEO Chris Licht and three executives told Oliver Darcy and his editor that Darcy's Donald Trump town hall critical coverage had been “too emotional”  —  CNN media reporter Oliver Darcy was reportedly scolded by his boss Chris Licht, the chairman and CEO of the network …
